property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: Error ocurred while attempting to open the file null null InvestigationCollectionView null null nullinvestigation null null nullinvesit null null Extensibility null null ResourceDictionary.xaml FILE file://G:/Users/AsteriskAmpersand/RiderProjects/MHW/MHW Save Editor/src/Resources/ResourcesDictionary.xaml new Investigation(InvestigationThinlayer null null ViewModelLocator null null Currentinvestigation null null BoxstoreCollection null null BoxstoreCollectionView null null

task.summary: Default task
Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.
Investigations tab is now element complete. Removed Business logic out of editor, will replace it for a warning of illegality until I learn to data bind as wpf wants things to be data binded.
Fixed Checksum Issues when saving.

Complete Refactoring -Investigation Completely Redone to be a thin layer over hex. -Investigation View Model now properly acts as a View Model for Investigation. -Rewrote the backup function to just use the operating system. -Fixed yet another checksum issue introduced by endianess.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
UI Complete Refactorization. Investigations tab still in progress but save, open, edit steamId and backup work.
Forgot a file
Reached 0.1 features (gained data grid though it can be replaced with a list if performance continues to be an issue) but with a codebase that makes sense and proper classing and user controls.
Fixed resources hard coded path.
Fixes #3 Fixes #4
README Update
README Update
Fixed Unencrypted save not working properly.
Filter now works (without error handling).
Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
Got Inventory Areas to show up.
Working Inventory Editing (only images are missing).
Working Inventory Editing with icons and softcoded paths.
Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.
Investigation editor now predicts number of boxes with icons.
Tempered Icons added.
Fixed crash when illegal items are placed on the wrong box. It will now delete them.
Temporarily plugged the leak.
Added information tab.
Slot enabled is now checked.
Name change fixed
Name change fixed
Update for Arch Tempered Kulve Taroth Items.

Added palico names, thanks to Ghost and Niteskys. This is an atrocious hack though. The main issue is that the palico name is part of the palico datablock which is not yet fully mapped or added to the editor, as a result a skip/jump offset is used. It will work for now but this is an absolute atrocity in terms of cleanliness of code and structure.
Added Palico Unity at the request of Dave uRrr.

MESSAGE.value: Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
Got Inventory Areas to show up.
Working Inventory Editing (only images are missing).
Working Inventory Editing with icons and softcoded paths.
Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.
Investigation editor now predicts number of boxes with icons.
Tempered Icons added.
Fixed crash when illegal items are placed on the wrong box. It will now delete them.
Temporarily plugged the leak.
Added information tab.
Slot enabled is now checked.
Name change fixed
Edit voucher resetting.
Update for Arch Tempered Kulve Taroth Items.

Added palico names, thanks to Ghost and Niteskys. This is an atrocious hack though. The main issue is that the palico name is part of the palico datablock which is not yet fully mapped or added to the editor, as a result a skip/jump offset is used. It will work for now but this is an absolute atrocity in terms of cleanliness of code and structure.
Added Palico Unity at the request of Dave uRrr.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added Palico Unity at the request of Dave uRrr.

marker.ph: /* Blowfish encryption (ECB, CBC and CTR mode) as defined by Bruce Schneier here: http://www.schneier.com/paper-b ... */
/* Which mode should I use? ... */
/* Things to remember ... */
"Global variables and constants"
/* For compatibility with the javascript crypto library: ... */
/// Constructor for hex key ...
/// Constructor for byte key ...
"Public methods"
/// Encrypts a string in CBC mode ...
/// Decrypts a string in CBC mode ...
/// Decrypts a byte array in CBC mode. ...
/// Encrypts a byte array in CBC mode. ...
/// Encrypt a string in ECB mode ...
/// Decrypts a string (ECB) ...
/// Encrypts a byte array in ECB mode ...
/// Decrypts a byte array (ECB) ...
/// Encrypts a string (CTR) ...
/// Decrypt a string (CTR) ...
/// Initialization vector for CBC mode. ...
/// Creates and sets a random initialization vector. ...
/// Sets up the S-blocks and the key ...
/// Encrypts or decrypts data in ECB mode ...
/// Encrypts or decrypts data in CBC mode ...
/// XoR encrypts two 8 bit blocks ...
/// Encrypts a 64 bit block ...
/// Decrypts a 64 bit block ...
/// Splits the block into the two uint values ...
/// Converts the two uint values into a 64 bit block ...
/// Runs the blowfish algorithm (standard 16 rounds) ...
/// Runs the blowfish algorithm in reverse (standard 16 rounds) ...
/// one round of the blowfish algorithm ...
/* SBLOCKS ARE THE HEX DIGITS OF PI. ... */

<<DockPanel Name="Root" xmlns:local="clr-namespace:MHW_Save_Editor"> <Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Restore" Click="RestoreFunction" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="Slot" IsEnabled="{Binding FileLoaded}"> <MenuItem Name="Slot0" IsChecked="True" Header="Slot 1" Click="SetSlot0Active" IsEnabled="{Binding Slot1Enabled}"/> <MenuItem Name="Slot1" Header="Slot 2" Click="SetSlot1Active" IsEnabled="{Binding Slot2Enabled}"/> <MenuItem Name="Slot2" Header="Slot 3" Click="SetSlot2Active" IsEnabled="{Binding Slot3Enabled}"/> <MenuItem Header="Reset Memory" Click="clearMem" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="Edit" ItemsSource = "{Binding EditOptions}" Click = "EditMenuItem_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding FileLoaded}"/> <MenuItem Header="Tools" ItemsSource = "{Binding ToolsOptions}" Click = "ToolsMenuItem_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding FileLoaded}"/> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl Name = "TabControl" SelectionChanged = "TabControl_SelectionChanged"> <TabItem Header="General"> <local:GeneralTab x:Name="GeneralTabControl" SteamLabelDoubleClicked="EditSteamLabel" VoucherResetDoubleClicked="EditVoucherCount"/> </TabItem> <TabItem Header="Information"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="SlotTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InvestigationsTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Inventory ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Inventory"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InventoryTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl> </Grid> </DockPanel>.../>

<<TextBlock Text="Research Points: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding ResearchPoints}" ShowButtonSpinner = "False" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "2147483647" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/>.../>

<<TextBlock Text="Hunter XP: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding HunterXP}" ShowButtonSpinner = "False" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "2147483647" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/>.../>

<<TextBlock Text="Playtime: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding hours}" ShowButtonSpinner = "False" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "9999" FormatString="N0" HorizontalAlignment="Right" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text="h" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding minutes}" ShowButtonSpinner = "False" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "59" FormatString="00" HorizontalAlignment="Right" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text="m" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding seconds}" ShowButtonSpinner = "False" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "59" FormatString="00" HorizontalAlignment="Right" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text="s" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/>.../>

<<TextBlock Text="Gender: Male" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <RadioButton IsChecked="{Binding Gender, Converter={StaticResource EnumBooleanConverter}, ConverterParameter={x:Static local:GenderEnum.Male}, Mode=TwoWay}" VerticalAlignment="Bottom"/> <TextBlock Text=" Female " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <RadioButton IsChecked="{Binding Gender, Converter={StaticResource EnumBooleanConverter}, ConverterParameter={x:Static local:GenderEnum.Female}, Mode=TwoWay}" VerticalAlignment="Bottom"/>.../>
<<TextBlock Text="Palico Unity: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>

<<xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding trapper, Mode=TwoWay}" ShowButtonSpinner = "True" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "700" HorizontalAlignment="Left" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text=" Trapper: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding trapper, Converter={StaticResource UnityConverter}, Mode=OneWay}" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>

<<xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding protector, Mode=TwoWay}" ShowButtonSpinner = "True" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "700" HorizontalAlignment="Left" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text=" Protectors: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding protector, Converter={StaticResource UnityConverter}, Mode=OneWay}" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>

<<xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding trouper, Mode=TwoWay}" ShowButtonSpinner = "True" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "700" HorizontalAlignment="Left" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text=" Troupers: " VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding trouper, Converter={StaticResource UnityConverter}, Mode=OneWay}" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>

<<xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding plunder, Mode=TwoWay}" ShowButtonSpinner = "True" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "700" HorizontalAlignment="Left" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text=" Plunderers :" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding plunder, Converter={StaticResource UnityConverter}, Mode=OneWay}" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>

<<xctk:IntegerUpDown Text="{Binding gaja, Mode=TwoWay}" ShowButtonSpinner = "True" Minimum = "0" Maximum = "700" HorizontalAlignment="Left" FormatString="N0" BorderBrush="Transparent" Background="Transparent"/> <TextBlock Text=" Gajalaka :" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBlock Text="{Binding gaja, Converter={StaticResource UnityConverter}, Mode=OneWay}" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>.../>
